Question: DeRuCCI Healthy Sleep Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
DeRuCCI Healthy Sleep Co., Ltd.

Product: T11 Pro Smart Mattress and DeRuCCI AI IoT line

Features:
- T11 Pro Smart Mattress, winner of the CES 2024 Innovation Award in Digital Health and Smart Home categories
- AI smart mattresses that warn users about potential health issues and adjust to individual's health for optimal sleep
- Anti-snore pillow that reduces snoring by up to 89%
- Intelligent height adjustable pillow for neck support and better sleep
- AI Tidal algorithm for real-time adjustments to match height, shape, and body areas
- AI sleep monitoring with personalized sleep consultations and recommendations
- IoT home products including Intelligent Switch, Intelligent Voice Control Panel, Intelligent Gateway, and Curtain Track
- Available in the U.S. in 2024

For more information, visit https://www.derucci.com
Summary_cn:
德瑞席健康睡眠有限公司。

产品：T11 Pro智能床垫和德瑞席人工智能物联网系列。

特点：
- T11 Pro智能床垫，荣获CES 2024数字健康和智能家居类创新奖
- AI智能床垫可提醒用户潜在的健康问题，并根据个体的健康状况进行调整，以获得最佳睡眠
- 减少打鼾的防打鼾枕，可减少89%的打鼾声
- 可调高度智能枕头，提供颈部支撑和更好的睡眠
- AI Tidal算法，实时调整以适应人的高度、形状和身体部位
- AI睡眠监测，提供个性化睡眠咨询和建议
- 物联网家居产品包括智能开关、智能语音控制面板、智能网关和窗帘轨道
- 2024年在美国上市

欲了解更多信息，请访问https://www.derucci.com
